mapper.insert: insert into exam ( exam_score, exam_description, exam_begin_time, exam_end_time, founder_id, exam_title ) values ( #{examScore}, #{examDescription}, #{examBeginTime}, #{examEndTime}, #{founderId}, #{examTitle} )
mapper.select: select exam_id, exam_title, exam_create_time, exam_begin_time, exam_end_time from exam where founder_id = #{founderId} and is_deleted=0 order by exam_create_time DESC
